page.title: 17THE STONES , BAUNTON LANE.
page.content: Mrs Stone awakes at 07.00. Breakfast 07.30, TV and computer in use. Mr Stone leaves at 08.00 for work, he will return at 19.45. Three sons leave, the eldest by bus to secondary school,middle walks to primary, youngest driven to Infants. During the day Mrs Stone loads dish washer, makes beds, vacuum cleans, visits bank, does shopping, has own lunch, prepares the family's evening meal, and does some gardening. The children return home by 16.00 they watch TV, play on their computer or with friends. 17.30 teatime. Cubs or Scouts for 2 eldest boys,youngest boy reads and is in bed by 19.45. Bedtime for eldest is 20.30 _ 21.30. Mrs Stone watches TV, sews, make sandwiches for the next day before going to bed at 23.00.
